message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and quality. This item is truly a testament to excellence and can significantly enhance your experience in [describe the context or use case of the product]. Considering its unparalleled features and benefits, I propose an offer of $120 for this product. I believe it offers a great opportunity for you to enjoy its full potential without compromising on quality. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further or making a purchase.
